name: Broke Brodie
description:
It's Broke Brodie's birthday!

But just where is his family?

This game was made in 3 days for Pixel Horror Jam 2!

Inspiration for the Broke Brodie comes from Fleischer cartoons from the 30's as well as NES era platform video games. Broke Brodie was originally from a bigger project that was cancelled but elements of the bigger game still appear here.

Thank you for playing!

Gameplay time should be 3 to 10 minutes.

2 bad ends, 1 neutral, 1 good end!

[Known Issues: You will have to restart the game if the platforms aren't functioning properly.]
